awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 8 nominations.

fullplot: Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous.
plot: Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous.
title: When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story
